description:
Toutaku Chuuei is the evil leader of Rakuyou who until his death held most of the other schools in a vice-grip, possessing both the manpower and the Gyokuji as well as a Hyakuhekitou. In addition, he possesses Dragon of Hao abilities, yet he is not one of them. He is also a masochist which is seen through his self-mutilation.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Toutaku Chuuei
